Text: all the files are available in other torrents, the idea of putting them all together in one big torrent was great, but there are only 85% available as of now (but season 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 and 8 are 100% downloadable already), i am about to resore the missing data (already uploaded the missig parts off season 1, 2, 3 and 6), but my upstream is very slow.
video qualety is great (up to date standart, unlike other older shows). but in season 1 the audio is out of sync sometimes.
anybody complayning about speed, or posting "seed" is an ***; yes it'll take about a week to download this (i am at 70% after 4days), but there are more than 10000minutes of video in here.
